languages.text: {n}Женщина растерянно оглядывается.{/n} "Как по мне, мы по уши увязли во всех ведомых и неведомых Человечеству сортах говна. Может, с арены как-то улизнуть можно? Не знаю, Лорд-капитан, боюсь, что я сейчас едва свои мысли от чужих отделить могу, не то что планы спасительные придумывать. Может, конечно, у шепотков какие подсказки найдутся?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Женщина растерянно оглядывается.{/n} "Как по мне, мы по уши увязли во всех ведомых и неведомых Человечеству сортах говна. Может, с арены как-то улизнуть можно? Не знаю, Лорд-капитан, боюсь, что я сейчас едва свои мысли от чужих отделить могу, не то что планы спасительные придумывать. Может, конечно, у шепотков какие подсказки найдутся?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}She looks around distractedly.{/n} "Looks to me like we're up to our necks in every type of shit known and unknown to Humanity. Could there be a way to sneak out of the arena? I don't know, Lord Captain — right now, I can't tell the difference between my own thoughts and the voices, let alone come up with an escape plan. But, of course, it's possible the whispers will give us a nudge in the right direction."

languages.text: {n}她心不在焉地扫视着周围。{/n}“在我看来，人类以前遇到过、没遇到过的所有困境，都落在了我们头上。有没有什么办法能从竞技场里溜出去？我也说不好，舰长大人。我现在连我自己的想法和那些声音都分不清，更别提什么逃跑的计划了。不过，话说回来，那些低语说不定会提示我们正确的方向。”
languages.original_text: {n}She looks around distractedly.{/n} "Looks to me like we're up to our necks in every type of shit known and unknown to Humanity. Could there be a way to sneak out of the arena? I don't know, Lord Captain — right now, I can't tell the difference between my own thoughts and the voices, let alone come up with an escape plan. But, of course, it's possible the whispers will give us a nudge in the right direction."

traits.locale_text: {n}她心不在焉地扫视着周围。{/n}“在我看来，人类以前遇到过、没遇到过的所有困境，都落在了我们头上。有没有什么办法能从竞技场里溜出去？我也说不好，舰长大人。我现在连我自己的想法和那些声音都分不清，更别提什么逃跑的计划了。不过，话说回来，那些低语说不定会提示我们正确的方向。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}She looks around distractedly.{/n} "Looks to me like we're up to our necks in every type of shit known and unknown to Humanity. Could there be a way to sneak out of the arena? I don't know, Lord Captain — right now, I can't tell the difference between my own thoughts and the voices, let alone come up with an escape plan. But, of course, it's possible the whispers will give us a nudge in the right direction."

languages.text: {n}Mira a su alrededor, distraída.{/n} «A mí me parece que estamos hasta el cuello de todos los tipos de mierda conocidos y desconocidos para la Humanidad. ¿Puede haber alguna salida del coliseo? No lo sé, Lord Capitán. Ahora mismo no puedo ni diferenciar mis pensamientos de las voces; mucho menos planear una fuga. Claro que también existe la posibilidad de que los susurros nos empujen en la dirección correcta...».
languages.original_text: {n}She looks around distractedly.{/n} "Looks to me like we're up to our necks in every type of shit known and unknown to Humanity. Could there be a way to sneak out of the arena? I don't know, Lord Captain — right now, I can't tell the difference between my own thoughts and the voices, let alone come up with an escape plan. But, of course, it's possible the whispers will give us a nudge in the right direction."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mira a su alrededor, distraída.{/n} «A mí me parece que estamos hasta el cuello de todos los tipos de mierda conocidos y desconocidos para la Humanidad. ¿Puede haber alguna salida del coliseo? No lo sé, Lord Capitán. Ahora mismo no puedo ni diferenciar mis pensamientos de las voces; mucho menos planear una fuga. Claro que también existe la posibilidad de que los susurros nos empujen en la dirección correcta...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼女は気もそぞろに辺りを見回している。{/n}「人類が知っているもの、知らないもの、あらゆる種類のゴミに首まで浸かっているように見えるわ。闘技場からこっそり抜け出す方法？わからないわ、ロード・キャプテン…今すぐにはね。あたいには、脱出計画はおろか、自分の考えと声の区別もつかないのだから。けれどもちろん、囁きが正しい方向へと導いてくれる可能性はあるわ」
languages.original_text: {n}She looks around distractedly.{/n} "Looks to me like we're up to our necks in every type of shit known and unknown to Humanity. Could there be a way to sneak out of the arena? I don't know, Lord Captain — right now, I can't tell the difference between my own thoughts and the voices, let alone come up with an escape plan. But, of course, it's possible the whispers will give us a nudge in the right direction."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は気もそぞろに辺りを見回している。{/n}「人類が知っているもの、知らないもの、あらゆる種類のゴミに首まで浸かっているように見えるわ。闘技場からこっそり抜け出す方法？わからないわ、ロード・キャプテン…今すぐにはね。あたいには、脱出計画はおろか、自分の考えと声の区別もつかないのだから。けれどもちろん、囁きが正しい方向へと導いてくれる可能性はあるわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sie blickt sich abgelenkt um.{/n} "Wir stecken wohl bis zum Hals in jeder Form von Scheiße, welche der Menschheit bekannt und bisher unbekannt ist. Ist es vielleicht irgendwie möglich, sich aus der Arena zu schleichen? Ich weiß nicht, Lord Captain, ich kann meine eigenen Gedanken im Augenblick nicht von den Stimmen unterscheiden, geschweige denn, mir einen Fluchtplan einfallen lassen. Aber natürlich ist es möglich, dass das Flüstern uns die richtige Richtung weist."
languages.original_text: {n}She looks around distractedly.{/n} "Looks to me like we're up to our necks in every type of shit known and unknown to Humanity. Could there be a way to sneak out of the arena? I don't know, Lord Captain — right now, I can't tell the difference between my own thoughts and the voices, let alone come up with an escape plan. But, of course, it's possible the whispers will give us a nudge in the right direction."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie blickt sich abgelenkt um.{/n} "Wir stecken wohl bis zum Hals in jeder Form von Scheiße, welche der Menschheit bekannt und bisher unbekannt ist. Ist es vielleicht irgendwie möglich, sich aus der Arena zu schleichen? Ich weiß nicht, Lord Captain, ich kann meine eigenen Gedanken im Augenblick nicht von den Stimmen unterscheiden, geschweige denn, mir einen Fluchtplan einfallen lassen. Aber natürlich ist es möglich, dass das Flüstern uns die richtige Richtung weist."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'air distrait, Idira regarde autour d'elle.{/n} « On dirait bien qu'on est dans la merde jusqu'au cou. Je ne saurais pas dire s'il est possible de s'échapper de l'arène, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Pour l'instant, je n'arrive même pas à faire la différence entre mes pensées et les voix, alors imaginer un plan pour filer d'ici... Après, on ne sait jamais, peut-être que les murmures pourront nous aiguiller. »
languages.original_text: {n}She looks around distractedly.{/n} "Looks to me like we're up to our necks in every type of shit known and unknown to Humanity. Could there be a way to sneak out of the arena? I don't know, Lord Captain — right now, I can't tell the difference between my own thoughts and the voices, let alone come up with an escape plan. But, of course, it's possible the whispers will give us a nudge in the right direction."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air distrait, Idira regarde autour d'elle.{/n} « On dirait bien qu'on est dans la merde jusqu'au cou. Je ne saurais pas dire s'il est possible de s'échapper de l'arène, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Pour l'instant, je n'arrive même pas à faire la différence entre mes pensées et les voix, alors imaginer un plan pour filer d'ici... Après, on ne sait jamais, peut-être que les murmures pourront nous aiguiller. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Şaşkına dönmüş hâlde etrafına bakıyor.{/n} "Bana öyle geliyor ki İnsanlık tarihinde görülmüş görülmemiş her türlü pisliğe gırtlağımıza kadar battık. Arenadan gizlenerek kaçmanın bir yolu var mıdır? Bilmiyorum Lord Kaptan. Şu anda zihnimdeki düşüncelerle sesler arasındaki farkı bile anlayamıyorum. Kaçışımızı nasıl planlayayım? Tabii fısıltıların bizi doğru istikamete yönlendirmesi mümkün olabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}She looks around distractedly.{/n} "Looks to me like we're up to our necks in every type of shit known and unknown to Humanity. Could there be a way to sneak out of the arena? I don't know, Lord Captain — right now, I can't tell the difference between my own thoughts and the voices, let alone come up with an escape plan. But, of course, it's possible the whispers will give us a nudge in the right direction."

traits.locale_text: {n}Şaşkına dönmüş bir hâlde etrafına bakıyor.{/n} "Bana öyle geliyor ki İnsanlık tarihinde görülmüş görülmemiş her türlü pisliğe gırtlağımıza kadar batmışız. Arenadan gizlenerek kaçmanın bir yolu var mıdır? Bilmiyorum Lord Kaptan. Şu anda zihnimdeki düşüncelerle sesler arasındaki farkı bile anlayamıyorum. Kaçışımızı nasıl planlayayım? Ancak fısıltıların bizi doğru istikamete yönlendirmesi elbette mümkün olabilir."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
